column1: Illustration size (256, 128, 1) by MRI of the head of a man of 37 years old with weighting in T2, with axial section. We carefully examine slice n°107 starting from the base of the skull. The following elements are present : the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 800.2441 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3460.6934 mm³, the temporal horn of left lateral ventricle of volume 15.8203 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 63.2812 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1172.0215 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 1.3184 mm³, the brainstem of volume 714.5508 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 113.3789 mm³, the left amygdala of volume 75.1465 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 826.6113 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3227.3438 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 22.4121 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 39.5508 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1350.0000 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 138.4277 mm³ and the right amygdala of volume 73.8281 mm³.
